'''2.13.7''' is an update to the launcher released on November 8, 2023.

== Changes ==
* Now you can give the gift of Minecraft more easily than before! Gift icons added to each game's page. Just in time for the holidays.
* Bug fixes around Bedrock update flow.
* Bug fixes around Realms access.
* UI enhancements & bug fixes around Launcher.

== Fixes ==
* {{Bug|MCL-23837}} - Twitter's rebranding to X since July 2023 is not reflected in the launcher.
* {{Bug|MCL-23857}} - Selected menu highlighting not properly centered.
* {{Bug|MCL-22543}} - Accessing the Minecraft Live section of the Minecraft Launcher at least one day before voting begins or ends from 12 PM to 1 PM EDT fails to insert a space between the days left count and the minutes left count.
* {{Bug|MCL-23825}} - Minecraft live vote countdown days,hours,minutes appears in reverse order on hebrew.
* {{Bug|MCL-23143}} - Broken links under the "Third-party licenses" section of the Minecraft Launcher.
